document_data.name: Daitya
document_data.mainbody: '''Daitya''' was the [[stone giant]] ruler of the [[Lodge of Faces]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Daitya and all her fellows succumbed to the ''[[faerzress]]''-infected madness caused by the [[Purple Statue]]. Daitya became obsessed with carving a perfect replica of the Purple Statue.{{Cite adventurers league/Szith Morcane Unbound|16}}
